mapper.insert:
insert into member(memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberZipcode, memberAddress_1, memberAddress_2, memberTel, memberPhone, memberPetName, memberPetAge, memberHolder, memberAccount, memberBank, memberEmail, memberAcceptedEmail, memberAcceptedSns )
values(#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberZipcode}, #{memberAddress_1}, #{memberAddress_2}, #{memberTel}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberPetName}, #{memberPetAge}, #{memberHolder}, #{memberAccount}, #{memberBank}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberAcceptedEmail}, #{memberAcceptedSns})
mapper.select: select memberId, memberPw, memberName, memberZipcode, memberAddress_1, memberAddress_2, memberTel, memberPhone, memberPetName, memberPetAge, memberHolder, memberAccount, memberBank, memberEmail, memberAcceptedEmail, memberAcceptedSns, memberRegDate from member where memberId = #{memberId}
